metadata.title: CVE-2020-23932 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in gpac before 1.0.1. A NULL pointer dereferenceexists in the function dump_isom_sdp located in filedump.c. It allows anattacker to cause Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
